definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

pinyin: Niu3 yue1 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: The New Yorker, US magazine/resident of New York

pinyin: Niu3 yue1 Di4 guo2 Da4 sha4

sentences.english: In Los Angeles you need to take a connecting flight to New York.
sentences.chinese: 在洛杉矶您需要转乘中转联程航班到纽约。

sentences.english: One day, Einstein was walking in a street in New Youk.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，爱因斯坦走在纽约的大街上。

sentences.english: The primary target for taggers in New York is the subway system.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约，“留名者”的首要目标是地铁系统。

sentences.english: The New York magazine is no stranger to controversial covers.
sentences.chinese: 纽约杂志对争议性封面司空见惯。

sentences.english: The opening ceremony of the New York branch of CCB was held on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 中国建设银行纽约分行开幕仪式在星期五举行。

sentences.english: Could you compare your lifestyle in your hometown and New York City?
sentences.chinese: 你能比较一下你在家乡和纽约的生活方式吗？

sentences.english: Well,I suppose one possibility would be to say the guy in New York is Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 我猜其中一个可能性会是，纽约家伙是拿破仑。

sentences.english: Mr. Clinton flew to his home in Chappaqua, N. Y.
sentences.chinese: 随后克林顿搭机前往其在纽约查巴克的家。

sentences.english: He passaged to New York last month.
I'm A-Ok. I heard that you are visiting NYC next month, why?
sentences.chinese: 我还行。听说你下个月要去纽约了，为什么？

sentences.english: India’s case was that of a 23-year-old who arrived in Hyderabad from New York.
sentences.chinese: 印度的患者是一名23岁从纽约到海德拉巴的青年人。

sentences.english: We definitely appreciate the direction that the NYT is taking.
sentences.chinese: 我们绝对赞赏纽约时报的这一发展方向。

sentences.english: Her works have been exhibited locally and in the Ripley's Museum in New York City.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品，在当地的博物馆里普利先生在纽约市。

sentences.english: The next date in the case at New York Supreme Court before Judge Michael Obus was set for July 18.
sentences.chinese: 纽约最高法庭就此案的下次开庭日期是7月18日。

sentences.english: For many immigrants, the Statue of Liberty was the first sight they saw sailing into New York City.
sentences.chinese: 自由女神是许多移民到纽约的人第一个看到的目标。

sentences.english: The Lower East Side Tenement Museum is one of the smaller museums in New York.
sentences.chinese: 下东区房屋博物馆是纽约较小的一个博物馆。

definition: Manhattan island/Manhattan borough of New York City
Manhattan borough of New York City
